trans-unit.source: Scenario 2 - Central Site with Remote Offices backing up to a Data Center

seg-source.mrk: Scenario 2 - Central Site with Remote Offices backing up to a Data Center

target.mrk: Scénario 2 - Site centralisé sans bureaux distants et sauvegarde vers un Data Center

trans-unit.source: The diagram (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_scenario2" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) illustrates <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in a backup configuration in which remote offices perform backups to a data center.

seg-source.mrk: The diagram (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_scenario2" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) illustrates <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in a backup configuration in which remote offices perform backups to a data center.

target.mrk: Le schéma (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_scenario2" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) illustre le <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> dans une configuration de sauvegarde dans laquelle des bureaux distants effectuent des sauvegardes vers un data center

seg-source.mrk: Scenario 2

target.mrk: Scénario 2

seg-source.mrk: Backup Solutions

target.mrk: Solutions de sauvegarde

trans-unit.source: Use the dedicated Application to back up the HyperStream data, blocks and streams to VLS.

seg-source.mrk: Use the dedicated Application to back up the HyperStream data, blocks and streams to VLS.

target.mrk: Utilisez l’application dédiée pour sauvegarder les données, blocs et flux HyperStream vers une VLS.

trans-unit.source: Duplicate the HyperStream media to tape for long term storage using either command line or VLSA.

seg-source.mrk: Duplicate the HyperStream media to tape for long term storage using either command line or VLSA.

target.mrk: Dupliquez les médias HyperStream sur bande pour conservation à long terme soit en ligne de commande, soit en utilisant la VLSA.

seg-source.mrk: Metadata database crashes

target.mrk: Crash de la base des métadonnées

trans-unit.source: Use the repair tool or the snapshot. See and Backup and Restore of the ADE Server with Snapshots.

seg-source.mrk: Use the repair tool or the snapshot.

See and <MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_Lina/Backup_Restore_ADE_Server_Snapshots.htm#server_protection_list_asg_2158168053_1020412" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Backup and Restore of the ADE Server with Snapshots</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Utilisez l’outil repair ou le snapshot.

Voir et <MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_Lina/Backup_Restore_ADE_Server_Snapshots.htm#server_protection_list_asg_2158168053_1020412" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Backup and Restore of the ADE Server with Snapshots</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Disk Array fails

target.mrk: Échec de la baie de disque

trans-unit.source: Add new disk and re-install the product.

seg-source.mrk: Add new disk and re-install the product.

target.mrk: Ajoutez un nouveau disque et réinstallez le produit.

alt-trans.seg-source: Add new disk and restore using the List Application.
alt-trans.target: Ajoutez un nouveau disque et restaurez à l’aide de l’application List.

trans-unit.source: If replication is enabled, use the repair tool and then the replication. See <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Security.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Protecting [%=HSS.hys_doc%]</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: If replication is enabled, use the repair tool and then the replication.
See <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Security.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Protecting [%=HSS.hys_doc%]</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Si la réplication est activée, utilisez l’outil repair puis la réplication.
Voir <MadCap:xref href="HSS_Security.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Protecting [%=HSS.hys_doc%]</MadCap:xref>.
